text: Soshite kare-ra wa iu. `Watashi-tachi no kokoro ni wa, anata ga maneku koto ni oi ga kake rarete iru. Mata watashi-tachi no mimi wa toku, shikamo watashi-tachi to anata no ma ni wa, maku ga kakatte iru. Sorede anata wa jibun no (nozomi no) koto o okonae. Watashi-tachi mo jibun no (nozomi no) koto o okonau
